text: I would much rather give them business, it would be harder for them to refuse muahahah! Okay, book it for me, you
Oh great! Thank you!
I want to go to Hamburg from Washington. no more than 1000.
No. do you have anything from Washington to San Antonio?
Anytime
Nice. Do you have anything from St. Petersburg to Hamburg?
St. Petersburg to San Antonio?
What’s the difference between this 13day package and the other 13day package?
Are those both economy?
Okay so I’m assuming I cant afford business then?
I’ll do the one from St. Petersburg then. Business class.
Thanks
Hi there I'd like to take my family on vacation.
We haven't decided on a destination yet, but we'll be leaving from Boston.
We'll be 4 adults and 1 child, looking for a trip between Monday September 12 and Saturday October 1st.
That does sound pretty good. How many days is that?
It does suit my budget, which is 14700 maximum. But I am curious about other destinations.
Whoa that's amazing. But we're looking for somewhere more exotic, so preferably somewhere outside the continent, if possible!
Isn't that still in the US? Can you suggest another interesting place for me? Maybe with a four or five star hotel?
What are the travel dates for the Goiania package please?
Wow, that's perfect! Yes, please book this trip for us! My family will be so happy!
Perfect! Thank you.
I need your help!
I need to bring my children to visit their mom who has been working very hard on a contract in Pittsburgh.
We will be 1 adult and seven children and we will be leaving from Kobe.
Not really
It does not matter really as long as the package is right. Can you tell me if you have hotel packages in Pittsburgh?
Which package has the soonest departure? The kids can't wait to see their mama!
I think my wife has 2 weeks off, so let's look at the 11 day package please
Do you know what activities there are close to the hotel? Any museums or parks we can visit?
Can you tell me a little bit about the hotel in the 7 day package?
Hmmmm the 7 day package is a lot more expensive than the 12 day  but it seems like a nicer place, plus I like the fact that we can take the kids to the museum.  Does it depart on September 12th too?
Yes, I like this package better. Please book us on economy class at a cost of $20697.17  and send me all the details by email. Good job, friend!
Thank you!

ok. I am going to shop around before I rush into anything

Impressive!! Now, I may be being greedy here..

And went to Atlanta..
I'm wondering if I could be under budget enough that I'd have enough left over for maybe another trip

But I appreciate you entertaining me this evening

Not me, I'm not going anywhere! I need THEM out of town! Send them anywhere you can!

3 star?!? They'll never go for it....they like luxury. Got anything that's like a 5 star?!
How about something on the beach? My mom likes to suntan.
The 4 star hotel in Rosario, what's that one like?

k the 23rd should be good...enough time to prepare for the competition. I don't want to spend all my savings though...they don't need to fly on business class that;s for rich people. Whats it cost on economy?
YES!!!! Lets get them outta town!
Thanks! :airplane::joy:
